price: Kuma Muka ce: daga bãyansa ga Banĩ Isrã'ĩla, "Ku zauni ƙasar. Sa'an nan idan wa'adin ƙarshe ya zo, zã Mu jẽ da ku jama'a-jama'a."*
arabic: وَقُلۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ لِبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱسۡكُنُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ جِئۡنَا بِكُمۡ لَفِيفٗا
footnotes: * Wannan magana tanã kamã da da'awar Yahũdu cewa yanã rubuce a cikin littãfinsu za su kõma haɗuwa bãyan rarraba a nan dũniya kuma Hadĩsin kõmawar Yahũdu a Falasɗĩnu, har Musulmi su yi yãƙi da su, sunã a kan gãɓar gabas kuma su Yahũdãwa suna a kan gãɓar yamma daga Kõgin Urdun yanã ƙarfafa wannan ra'ayi. Kuma an ruwaito cewa daga cikin alãmõmin Tãshin Ƙiyãma akwai kõmãwar Yahũdu a Falasɗinu. Allah ne Mafi sani.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
